		<script type="text/javascript" src="http://uktv.co.uk/js/food/main-hero-carousel.js?C70D0E07DDFD364C3B1D82E85E55CC9520150405"></script> <!--_allchannels/tracking/dsp_urchin-->


<!-- Google Analytics Tracking -->
<script type="text/javascript">
	var _gaq = _gaq || [];
	_gaq.push(['_setAccount', 'UA-1623692-1']);
	_gaq.push(['_setAllowAnchor', true]);
	_gaq.push(['_addOrganic', 'google', 'q', true, 'google images', '/imgres?']);
	_gaq.push(['_trackPageview']);
		
	function WaitForSeconds(interval) {
		s = interval * 1000;
		var t = new Date().getTime(); 
		while ((new Date().getTime() - t) < s) { var x = 0 >> 1; }
	}

	var initCount = 0;

	//Common Google Analytics extended tracking
	$(document).ready(function() {

		// if (initCount==0 && 1==2){
		if (initCount==0){
			(function() { 
				var ga = document.createElement('script'); ga.type = 'text/javascript'; ga.async = true;
				ga.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://ssl' : 'http://www') + '.google-analytics.com/ga.js';
				var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(ga, s);
			})();

			initCount++;
			//Outbound link tracking
			$('a[href*="aviva.co"]').click(function() { _gaq.push('_trackEvent', 'Outbound Links', 'Clickthrough', 'Aviva'); WaitForSeconds(0.25); });
			$('a[href*="amazon."]').click(function() { _gaq.push('_trackEvent', 'Outbound Links', 'Clickthrough', 'Amazon'); WaitForSeconds(0.25); });
			$('a[href*="bbcgoodfood.com"]').click(function() { _gaq.push('_trackEvent', 'Outbound Links', 'Clickthrough', 'BBC Good Food'); WaitForSeconds(0.25); });
			$('a[href*="mysupermarket.co.uk"]').click(function() { _gaq.push('_trackEvent', 'Outbound Links', 'Clickthrough', 'MySupermarket'); WaitForSeconds(0.25); });		
			//Track newsletter subscriptions
			$('#newsletter-signup').one('submit', function() { _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'Food Newsletter', 'Signup', location.pathname]); WaitForSeconds(0.25); });
			//Track print link clicks
			$('a.print-version').click(function(){ _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'Print', 'Print: ' + document.title, location.pathname]); WaitForSeconds(0.25); });
			//Track email link clicks
			$('a[href^="mailto:"]').click(function() { _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'E-Mail Links', 'Click', $(this).attr('href').replace('mailto:','')]); WaitForSeconds(0.25); });
			//Track downloads of jpg, jpeg, pdf and mp3 files
			$('a[href]').filter(function() {
				return /(jpe?g|pdf|mp3)$/.test( $(this).attr('href'))
			}).click(function(event) {
				_gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'Files', 'Download', $(this).attr('href')]);
				WaitForSeconds(0.25);
			});
			//Track any social share links not converted to their plugin buttons
			$('a.track-share-link').click(function() {
				var n = $(this).attr('href').replace(/.*?(twitter|facebook|plus|del\.icio\.us|stumble|digg|reddit|bookmarks).*/gi,'$1');
				if ( n == 'twitter') { _gaq.push(['_trackSocial', 'Twitter', 'Tweet']); }
				if ( n == 'facebook') { _gaq.push(['_trackSocial', 'Facebook', 'Like']); }
				if ( n == 'plus') { _gaq.push(['_trackSocial', 'Google', '+1']); }
				if ( n == 'del.icio.us') { _gaq.push(['_trackSocial', 'Del.icio.us', 'Share']); }
				if ( n == 'stumble') { _gaq.push(['_trackSocial', 'StumbleUpon', 'Share']); }
				if ( n == 'digg') { _gaq.push(['_trackSocial', 'Digg', 'Share']); }
				if ( n == 'reddit') { _gaq.push(['_trackSocial', 'Reddit', 'Share']); }
				if ( n == 'bookmarks') { _gaq.push(['_trackSocial', 'Google Bookmarks', 'Bookmark']); }
			});
			//Track clicks on 'Recently viewed recipes' text or image links
			$('ul#recently-viewed-carousel li a').click(function() {
				var t = $(this).attr('uktv:wt-link-name');
				var l = '(unknown)';
				if(t == 'Text link') { l = $(this).text(); }
				else { l = $(this).children('img').attr('alt'); }
				_gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'Recently Viewed Recipes', 'View', l]);
			});
			//Account registrations (this doesn't have to be on all pages)
			$('form[action="http://uktv.co.uk/food/registerprocess"]').one('submit', function() { _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'Site Registrations', 'Register', 'Good Food Channel']); WaitForSeconds(0.25); });
			//Track competition form submissions
			if(/competition\/aid\/([0-9]+)/.test($(location).attr('pathname'))) {
				$('a.channelBtn > img[alt="Finish"]').click(function() {
					var id = $(location).attr('pathname');
					var re = /aid\/([0-9]+)/gi
					match = re.exec(id);
					if (match != null) { id = match[1]; }
					var name = $(document).attr('title').replace(/(.+?):.*/,'$1');
					_gaq.push(['_trackEvent','Good Food Competitions','Submit Entry', name + ' (ID: ' + id + ')']);
					WaitForSeconds(0.25);
				});
			}
			//Set Custom Variable slot 2 and track an event for users who submit a comment
			$('#comment-form').one('submit', function() {
				_gaq.push(['_setCustomVar', 2, 'Comments', location.pathname, 2]);
				_gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'Comments', 'Submit', location.pathname]);
				WaitForSeconds(0.25);
			});

			if(typeof FB !== 'undefined'){// this test added to prevent FB undefined error SCP 24/9/2012
				FB.Event.subscribe('edge.create', function(targetUrl) { _gaq.push(['_trackSocial', 'Facebook', 'like', targetUrl]); });
				FB.Event.subscribe('edge.remove', function(targetUrl) { _gaq.push(['_trackSocial', 'Facebook', 'unlike', targetUrl]); });
			}
			
			twttr.events.bind('tweet', function(event){
			  if (event) {
			    var targetUrl;
			    if (event.target && event.target.nodeName == 'IFRAME') {
			      targetUrl = extractParamFromUri(event.target.src, 'url');
			      _gaq.push(['_trackSocial', 'Twitter', 'tweet', targetUrl]);
			    } else {
			      _gaq.push(['_trackSocial', 'Twitter', 'tweet']);
				}
			  }
			});

		}
	});
</script>
<!-- End Google Analytics Tracking -->

<body class="nojs sister-brand" id="html-body">


<script type="text/javascript">
function addCSS() {
	var linktghref = "";
	if (linktghref!=""){
	    var headtg = document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0];
	    if (!headtg) return;
	    var linktg = document.createElement('link');
	    linktg.type = 'text/css';
	    linktg.rel = 'stylesheet';
	    linktg.href = linktghref;
	    headtg.appendChild(linktg);
	}
} 
</script> 
		<script type="text/javascript">
			adSrc = "http://2a7e9.v.fwmrm.net/ad/g/1?nw=174057&pvrn=211597957881&csid=food/homepage&resp=ad;_fw_fss=_fw_search&;ptgt=s&envp=g_js&slid=c4advert-PageSkin&w=1024&h=768";
			adScript = '<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="'+adSrc+'"></scr' + 'ipt>';
			document.write(adScript);
			var ChannelName = 'good-food-channel'
		</script>
	
<!-- Begin comScore OnClick v1.1.1 code (c) 2004-2009 Copyright Nedstat B.V. All rights reserved -->
<script type="text/javascript" language="JavaScript">
	//<[CDATA[
	function ns_onclick(i,b,c,h,j)
	{
		var e="";
		if(typeof ns_pixelUrl=="string")
		{
			e=ns_pixelUrl.substring(0,ns_pixelUrl.indexOf("?")+1)}e+=c;
			e+="&ns_type="+h+"&ns_action=view";
			e+="&ns__t="+(new Date()).getTime();
			if(!b)
			{
				b=i.href
			}
			var	d=document.referrer;
			if(d.lastIndexOf("/")==d.length-1)
			{
				d=d.substring(d.lastIndexOf("/"),0)
			}
			if(d.length>0)
			{
				e+="&amp;ns_referrer="+escape(d)
			}
			j=j||"";
			var	f=(i&&i.target&&i.target!="")?(i.target.substring(0,1)=="_")?i.target.substring(1):i.target:"self";
			var g=new Image();
			if(f&&b)
			{
				if(window[f])
				{
					window.ns_softclick_timer=function(k,a)
					{
						return function()
						{
							if(window.ns_softclick_timeout)
							{
								window.clearTimeout(window.ns_softclick_timeout)
							}
							g.onload=g.onerror=function(){return};
							window[((window[k])?k:"self")].location.href=a
						}
					}(f,b);
					ns_softclick_timeout=window.setTimeout("ns_softclick_timer()",5000);
					g.onload=g.onerror=window.ns_softclick_timer
				}
				else
				{
					window.open(b,f,j)
				}
			}
			g.src=e;
			return false;
	};
	// ]]>
</script>
<!-- End comScore OnClick v1.1.1 code -->







<!-- Begin CMC v2.0 -->
<script type="text/javascript">
	// <![CDATA[
	function sitestat(u)
	{
		var d=document,l=d.location;
		ns_pixelUrl=u+"&ns__t="+(new Date().getTime());
		u=ns_pixelUrl+"&ns_c="+((d.characterSet)?d.characterSet:d.defaultCharset)+"&ns_ti="+escape(d.title)+"&ns_jspageurl="+escape(l&&l.href?l.href:d.URL)+"&ns_referrer="+escape(d.referrer);
		var	m=u.lastIndexOf("&");
		if(u.length>2000&&m>=0)
		{
			u=u.substring(0,m+1)+"ns_cut="+u.substring(m+1,u.lastIndexOf("=")).substring(0,40)
		}
		(d.images)?new Image().src=u:d.write('<'+'p><'+'img	src="'+u+'" height="1" width="1" alt="*"/'+'><'+'/p>');
	};
	
		sitestat("//uk.sitestat.com/uktv/goodfood/s?name=Good%20Food%20Channel%20%7C%2018%2C000%20recipes%2C%20cooking%20videos%20and%20top%20celebrity%20chefs%3A%20UKTV%20Food&uktv_campaign=CED370,A66484,96C7FB,AE068E,9DF7CD");
	
	// ]]>
</script>

	<noscript><p><img src="//uk.sitestat.com/uktv/goodfood/s?name=Good%20Food%20Channel%20%7C%2018%2C000%20recipes%2C%20cooking%20videos%20and%20top%20celebrity%20chefs%3A%20UKTV%20Food&uktv_campaign=CED370,A66484,96C7FB,AE068E,9DF7CD" height="1" width="1" alt="*"/></p></noscript>

<!-- End CMC -->

								</div>
							</div>
						</li>
							
						<li class="slide">
							<div class="caption-overlay"><a title="Dinner party inspiration" href="/food/homepage/sid/513" class="img"><img alt="" src="http://uktv.co.uk/images/homepage/1143528418731.jpg"></a>
								<div class="caption normal image-info">
									<h2 class="title"><a title="Dinner party inspiration" href="/food/homepage/sid/513">Dinner party inspiration</a></h2>
									<p class="sub-title"><a title="Dinner party inspiration" href="/food/homepage/sid/513"><span>Starters, mains and desserts for easy weekend entertaining</span></a></p>
								</div>
							</div>
						</li>
							
						<li class="slide">
							<div class="caption-overlay"><a title="Easy cakes" href="/food/gallery/aid/643316" class="img"><img alt="" src="http://uktv.co.uk/images/homepage/11435337963863.jpg"></a>
								<div class="caption normal image-info">
									<h2 class="title"><a title="Easy cakes" href="/food/gallery/aid/643316">Easy cakes</a></h2>
									<p class="sub-title"><a title="Easy cakes" href="/food/gallery/aid/643316"><span>Get baking with simple recipes like coffee, almond and blackcurrant cake</span></a></p>
								</div>
							</div>
						</li>
									
			</ul>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>	
				
			
				
				
			

		
		
			<style>
	div.box-long-wrapper .fancyPromoBox h2 { font-size: 22px; }
	.fancyPromoBox .figure { margin: 0; }
	.fancyPromoBox .figcaption { margin: 0; }
	</style>

		<p class="ads-by-google"><a href="http://services.google.com/feedback/abg?url=http://uktv.co.uk/food/homepage/sid/566&hl=en&client=ca-pub-9539822832326922" target="_blank">Ads by Google</a></p>
		<ul class="google-ads" id="google-ads-bottom-list-container">

		</ul>
		<div class="box-long-bot"></div>
	</div>


	<script type="text/javascript">
		//<![CDATA[
			if(!google_adnum){
				var google_adnum = 0;
			}
			var skip = google_adnum;

			// callback function (required), this is custom to produce the markup we want
			function google_ad_request_done(google_ads) {
				var s = '';

				if(google_ads.length == 0){
					document.getElementById('google-ads-bottom-container').style.display = 'none'; // hide the google ads div if there are no ads
					return;
				}

				for(var i = 0; i < google_ads.length; ++i) {
					s +=	'<li><a href="' + google_ads[i].url + '" id="google_ad_bottom_' + (i+1) + '_a">' + google_ads[i].line1 + '</a>' +
							'<p>' + google_ads[i].line2 + '<br/>' + google_ads[i].line3 + '</p>' +
							'<p><a class="public-url" href="' + google_ads[i].url + '" id="google_ad_bottom_' + (i+1) + '_b">' +  google_ads[i].visible_url +
							'</a></p></li>';

					google_adnum++;
				}
				document.getElementById('google-ads-bottom-list-container').innerHTML = s;
				return;
			}

			google_ad_client = 'pub-9539822832326922';
			google_ad_channel = '9307406723';
			google_ad_output = 'js';
			google_max_num_ads = '3';
			google_ad_type = 'text_html';
			google_feedback = 'on';
			google_skip = skip;
		//]]>
	</script>

	
	<script type="text/javascript" src="http://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/show_ads.js"></script>
				</div>
				<div class="sidebar">

	<h2>Advertisement</h2>
	<span class="mpu-content" id="uktv-mpu-ad">

			<form id="_fw_form_VPNT_1" style="display:none">

			</form>
			<span id="_fw_container_VPNT_1" class="_fwac"></span>
		</span>
	</span>

	<form id="newsletter-signup" name="newsletter-signup" method="post" action="http://uktv.co.uk/food/signup-to-newsletter">

		<h2>
			<span></span>
			Want weekly recipes?
		</h2>
		<fieldset>
			<legend></legend>
			<label for="email">Email</label>
			<input name="email" id="email" type="text" size="20" />
			<input type="hidden" name="newsletterId" id="newsletterId" value="10" />
			<input type="hidden" name="isQuickNLSignUp" id="isQuickNLSignUp" value="true" />
			
			<a class="btn" onClick="document.forms['newsletter-signup'].submit();" href="javascript:void(0);">Sign up</a>
		</fieldset>
		<p class="disclaimer">
			By signing up to our newsletter you are agreeing to our 
			<a href="http://network.uktv.co.uk/article/terms-and-conditions/" title="Terms & Conditions" alt="Terms & Conditions" target="_blank">Terms and Conditions</a> and confirm you are over 18.
		</p>
		
		

			<p class="footer"><a href='http://uktv.co.uk/food/homepage/sid/9443'>See the latest newsletter</a></p>
		
	</form>
<!--END FUSEBOX NO-CACHE--> 
	<div class="rhc-channel-links">
		<ul>
			<li><div class="platform-sky">Sky</div></li>

			<li><span>260</span></li>

		</ul>

	<div class="google-ads" id="google-ads-container">
		<div>
			<p class="ads-by-google"><a href="http://services.google.com/feedback/abg?url=http://uktv.co.uk/food/homepage/sid/566&hl=en&client=ca-pub-9539822832326922" target="_blank">Ads by Google</a></p>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		//<![CDATA[
		if(!google_adnum){
			var google_adnum = 0;
		}
		var skip = google_adnum;

		// callback function (required), this is custom to produce the markup we want
		function google_ad_request_done(google_ads) {
			var s = '';

			if(google_ads.length == 0){
				document.getElementById('google-ads-container').style.display = 'none'; // hide the google ads div if there are no ads
				return;
			}

			for(var i = 0; i < google_ads.length; ++i) {
				s +=	'<li><a href="' + google_ads[i].url + '" id="google_ad_right_' + (i+1) + '_a">' + google_ads[i].line1 + '</a>' +
						'<p>' + google_ads[i].line2 + '<br/>' + google_ads[i].line3 + '</p>' +
						'<p><a class="public-url" href="' + google_ads[i].url + '" id="google_ad_right_' + (i+1) + '_b">' + google_ads[i].visible_url + '</a></p></li>';

				google_adnum++;
			}
			document.getElementById('google-ads-list-container').innerHTML = s;
			return;
		}

		google_ad_client = 'pub-9539822832326922';
		google_ad_channel = '1303187738';
		google_ad_output = 'js';
		google_max_num_ads = '2';
		google_ad_type = 'text_html';
		google_feedback = 'on';
		google_skip = skip;
		//]]>
	</script>

	
	<script type="text/javascript" src="http://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/show_ads.js"></script>

<div class="about-good-food-wrapper center-column">
	<div class="footer">
		<h2>About Us</h2>
		<h3 id="number-of-recipes">Over 18,000 Recipes to choose from!</h3>
		<ul class="media-type">
			<li>
				<img src="/images/food/seal-of-excellence.png" alt="NetObserver Seal of Excellence" />
				<h3>Awards</h3>
				<p><strong>NetObserver</strong><br />Autumn 2013 Seal of Excellence.</p>
				<!--<p><strong>Experian Hitwise</strong>,<br />Top Ten Website 2011</p>
				<p><strong>Cordon Bleu</strong>,<br />World Media Award 2010</p>-->
			</li>
			<li>
				<a href="http://uktv.co.uk/food/tv/"><img alt="On TV" title="On TV" src="http://uktv.co.uk/images/food/recipes/about-good-food/good-food-channel.png" border="0" width="89px" height="90px" /></a>
				<h3>On TV</h3>
				<p>Watch all your favourite chefs on the Good Food channel. Sky 133, Virgin 260.
					<br />Also available in Sky HD
				</p>
				<p><a href="http://uktv.co.uk/food/tv/">See all Good Food Channel TV listings</a></p>
			</li>
			<li>
				<a href="https://www.subscribeonline.co.uk/bbc-magazines/subscription.cfm?mag=GDFD&cmp=GFUKT509" target="_blank"><img alt="Good Food Magazine" src="/images/food/recipes/about-good-food/good-food-magazine.png" border="0" /></a>
				<h3>BBC Good Food</h3>
				<p>Visit the BBC Good Food website for tried and tested recipes from Good Food and Olive magazines</p>
				<p><a target="_blank" href="http://www.bbcgoodfood.com">bbcgoodfood.com</a></p>
			</li>
			<li class="last">
				<a href="http://www.bbcgoodfoodshow.com/?utm_source=uktv%2Bwebsite&utm_medium=website&utm_campaign=GFshows" target="_blank"><img 
				alt="The BBC Good Food Show" title="The Good Food Show" src="/images/food/recipes/about-good-food/good-food-show.png" border="0"/></a>
				<h3>Events</h3>
				<p>Come join us at the Good Food Shows in Scotland, London and Birmingham</p>
				<p><a href="http://www.bbcgoodfoodshow.com/?utm_source=uktv%2Bwebsite&utm_medium=website&utm_campaign=GFshows" target="_blank">Plan your trip and book <br />tickets online now</a></p>
			</li>			
		</ul>
			<p>The Good Food Channel has some of the most mouth-watering programmes on TV and recipes from your favourite celebrity chefs. We've got a world of food entertainment to feast on, whether it's crazy chocolate creations in Choccywoccydooddah, the Hairy Bikers on a Mississippi adventure or the return of legendary cook Madhur Jaffrey.</p>
	<p>Alongside the channel, our <a href="http://www.goodfoodchannel.co.uk/" title="Good Food Channel">website</a> is updated daily and is home to more than 18,000 recipes, to-to-cook videos, food quizzes and regular foodie competitions.</p>
	<p>Find us on Sky 133 and Virgin 260, also available in Sky HD. You can keep up with new recipes and programmes on <a href="https://twitter.com/goodfoodchannel" target="_blank" title="Good Food on Twitter">Twitter</a>, <a href="https://www.facebook.com/goodfoodchannel" target="_blank" title="Good Food on Facebook">Facebook</a>, <a href="http://pinterest.com/goodfoodchannel/" target="_blank" title="Good Food on Pinterest">Pinterest</a> and <a href="https://plus.google.com/109585100313288126507" rel="publisher" title="Good Food on Google+">Google+</a>.</p>
	</div>
</div> <!--dsp_siteNav-->

	$(document).ready(function(){

				appId: '172431169478101', 
				status: true, 
				cookie: true,
				xfbml: true,
				channelUrl: 'http://uktv.co.uk/channel.html'
		});

	$(document).ready(function(){	
		var po = document.createElement('script'); po.type = 'text/javascript'; po.async = true;
		po.src = 'https://apis.google.com/js/plusone.js';
		var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(po, s);
	});
</script>

<script src="http://uktv.co.uk/js/externalLinks.js" type="text/javascript"></script>


<script type="text/javascript" src="//assets.pinterest.com/js/pinit.js"></script>



<script type="text/javascript">//<![CDATA[
	var clickTotal = 0;

	
	$("a[uktv\\:wt-link-group]").click(function(e){				
		ns_onclick(this,'',$(this).attr('uktv:wt-link-name')+'&uktv_linkpos='+$(this).attr('uktv:wt-link-group'),'clickout');
		_gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'Outbound Links', $(this).attr('uktv:wt-link-group'), $(this).attr('uktv:wt-link-name')]);
	});
	
	
		var adImpressionCounter = 0;
		$('.callReload').click(function(e) {
			e.preventDefault(); 
			adsReload(); // added back in SCP 4/7/2012 as food wasn't refreshing.   removed 15/10/12 causing probs.
			// tracking
			uktv.tracker.trackGPageView();
			sitestat('http://uk.sitestat.com/uktv/goodfood/s?name=Good%20Food%20Channel&amp;ns_type=view&uktv_loggedin=false');
			//ns_onclick(this,'',$(this).attr('uktv:wt-link-name')+'&uktv_linkpos='+$(this).attr('uktv:wt-link-group'),'clickout');
		});
	
	// ]]> 
			
	function gpluscall(jsonParam){
		ns_onclick(this,'','Google Plus button click:' + jsonParam.state +'&uktv_linkpos=Social Sharing Links','clickout');
	}
	
	
	
		$("a[href='http://www.bbcgoodfood.com']").click(function(e){
			ns_onclick(this,'',(this.id ? this.id : '')+'&uktv_linkpos=BBC Good Food Links','clickout');
		});
	
		$("a.track-share-link").click(function(e){
			ns_onclick(this,'',(this.id ? this.id : '')+'&uktv_linkpos=Social Sharing Links','clickout');
		});
	
		$("ul#recently-viewed-carousel li a").click(function(e){
			ns_onclick(this,'',(this.id ? this.id : '')+'&uktv_linkpos=Recently Viewed Recipes','clickout');
		});
	

</script>

	



<script type="text/javascript">
	//This will create an async <script> to load the FreeWheel LinkTag2 js.
   	(function() {
   		var profilePath = "uktv_display";
	   		window._fw_linktag_params = {
	   		scan_delay : 0,
	   		server : "2a7e9.v.fwmrm.net",
	   		
	   			network_id : "174057", // Live
	   		
	   		profile : "g_js",
	   		other_global_params : "csid=food/homepage",
	   		key_values :  "uktvid=AE068E"
    	};

	    var e = function(){
		    if(document.addEventListener) document.removeEventListener('DOMContentLoaded',e,false);
		    else window.detachEvent('onload',e);
		    window._fw_page_ready = true;
	    };
	    if(document.addEventListener) document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded',e,false);
	    else if(window.attachEvent) window.attachEvent('onload',e);
	
	    var lt = document.createElement('script');
	    lt.type = 'text/javascript';
	    lt.async = true;
	
	    lt.src = "http://adm.fwmrm.net/p/"+ profilePath +"/LinkTag2.js";
	    var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(lt, s); 
    })();
</script>	



<script type="text/javascript">
	function fw_config(){
		return{
				
	    			network_id : "174057", // Live
	    			siteSectionNetworkId:174057,
					videoAssetNetworkId:174057,
					fw_server:"http://2a7e7.v.fwmrm.net/ad/p/1",
					siteSection:"food/homepage",
					autoplay:false,
					amLocation:"http://adm.fwmrm.net/p/uktv_short_live/AdManager.swf"
					,fw_keyvalues: "uktvid=AE068E" 
			};
	}
	 
	function adsReload(){
		$('img#_fw_cb_VPNT_1').remove();
		$('img#_fw_cb_VPNT_2').remove();
		$('img#_fw_cb_VPNT_3').remove();
		
		var lt = document.createElement('script');
	    lt.type = 'text/javascript';
	    lt.async = true;
	
	    lt.src = "http://adm.fwmrm.net/p/uktv_display/LinkTag2.js";
	    var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(lt, s);
		
		window._fw_page_ready = true;
	}
</script>
<script type='text/javascript'>
function crtg_getCookie(a){var b,c,d,e=document.cookie.split(";");for(b=0;b<e.length;b++){c=e[b].substr(0,e[b].indexOf("="));d=e[b].substr(e[b].indexOf("=")+1);c=c.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,"");if(c==a){return unescape(d)}}return""}var crtg_nid="1065";var crtg_cookiename="cto2_channel4";var crtg_content=crtg_getCookie(crtg_cookiename);var crtg_rnd=Math.floor(Math.random()*99999999999);var crtg_url="http://rtax.criteo.com/delivery/rta/rta.js?netid="+escape(crtg_nid);crtg_url+="&cookieName="+escape(crtg_cookiename);crtg_url+="&rnd="+crtg_rnd;crtg_url+="&varName=crtg_content";var crtg_script=document.createElement("script");crtg_script.type="text/javascript";crtg_script.src=crtg_url;crtg_script.async=true;if(document.getElementsByTagName("head").length>0)document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(crtg_script);else if(document.getElementsByTagName("body").length>0)document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0].appendChild(crtg_script);
</script> 
</body>
</html>
